description: This presentation tells a story of a hackathon where mixing a cool idea with the latest technologies resulted in the grand prize and the fan favourite award of the IBM Sparkathon with nearly 600 participants. It will also include a demo on applying the key technologies and how they were effectively combined in the context of the Bluemix platform.
short_description: This presentation tells a story of a hackathon where mixing a cool idea with the latest technologies resulted in the grand prize
title: Devoxx Poland 2016 - Radek Ostrowski - Finding Your Perfect Weather with Apache Spark, Docker and...
